title: Multi-Granularity Detector for Vulnerability Fixes. (arXiv:2305.13884v1 [cs.CR])
abstract: With the increasing reliance on Open Source Software, users are exposed to third-party library vulnerabilities. Software Composition Analysis (SCA) tools have been created to alert users of such vulnerabilities. SCA requires the identification of vulnerability-fixing commits. Prior works have proposed methods that can automatically identify such vulnerability-fixing commits. However, identifying such commits is highly challenging, as only a very small minority of commits are vulnerability fixing. Moreover, code changes can be noisy and difficult to analyze. We observe that noise can occur at different levels of detail, making it challenging to detect vulnerability fixes accurately.  To address these challenges and boost the effectiveness of prior works, we propose MiDas (Multi-Granularity Detector for Vulnerability Fixes). Unique from prior works, Midas constructs different neural networks for each level of code change granularity, corresponding to commit-level, file-level, hunk-level,

translated_title: 漏洞修复的多粒度检测器
translated_abstract: 随着对开源软件的日益依赖，用户暴露于第三方库漏洞之中。为了提醒用户此类漏洞，已经开发了软件组成分析（SCA）工具。SCA需要确定漏洞修复提交。以前的工作已经提出了可以自动识别这样的漏洞修复提交的方法。然而，鉴定这样的提交是极具挑战性的，因为只有极少数提交是漏洞修复。此外，代码更改可能是嘈杂且难以分析的。我们观察到，噪声可以出现在不同层次的细节中，使得准确检测漏洞修复变得极具挑战性。为了应对这些挑战并提高以前工作的有效性，我们提出了MiDas（漏洞修复的多粒度检测器）。MiDas与以前的工作不同，它为每个代码更改粒度级别构建不同的神经网络，分别对应于提交级别、文件级别、碎片级别。
tldr: 针对软件漏洞修复的挑战，提出了一种名为MiDas的多粒度检测器，它利用不同级别的代码更改构建多个神经网络来识别漏洞修复提交。
en_tdlr: Addressing the challenges of software vulnerability fixes, MiDas is proposed as a multi-granularity detector that uses multiple neural networks at different levels of code changes to identify vulnerability-fixing commits.
